channel.title: Encyption id !=10
channel.description: I'm trying to log in to my server with a different client, and get the error in my server cmd encyption id !=10. I'm guessing this has something to do with the UID, and would like to know how I can either disable it so it doesn't require a certain client, or change it.

item.title: Encyption id !=10
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

Excellent! I’m glad I could help. Most of my advice goes unheeded, because I explain the general concept of the problem, not the exact step by step process on how to resolve it. Well done sir!

Read full topic

item.title: Encyption id !=10
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

Wintercanon:

Seems to me your client or server has an irregular login protocol. If the RSA block is successful the client sends a byte (10) to the server. Your server is waiting for the expected byte (10), but is receiving something else indicating that the client has a modified login protocol. Good luck figuring what’s different in the client.

Thank you very much. Helped a lot. Had to modify my RS2LoginProtocolDecoder a bit, but all is working now.

Read full topic
